body:
Comment 3: 
I guess we could make a new function for it, but it's already possible to just setup
your own tls.Listener and call Server.Serve(net.Listener).

Even if we made a new method on Server, you'd still have to do it by hand if you wanted
to:

  -- setup new NextProtos (e.g. SPDY)
  -- add more than 1 cert
  -- get your certs from somewhere other than disk

I guess those are all rare.
